item.title: Comment on The Past Is Here by lyz19730417
item.dc:creator: lyz19730417
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../the-past-is-here.html#comment-3">infarct</a>.
Glad you enjoyed the blogs. I haven't set up a feed and don't plan to in the future, as this is just a recreational hobby for me. Just check back once in a while :)
